title: FTP Weak Permissions Challenge
description: Engage in an exploration of a company's FTP server that has weak file permissions.
hints: Try connecting to the FTP server using anonymous access.
Look for files that might have been uploaded by mistake.
Check the permissions on the FTP directory and files.
learningObjectives: Understand the implications of weak permissions on FTP servers.
Learn how to navigate and exploit FTP server configurations.
Identify security flaws in file permissions settings.
